lead_paragraph: The growth of ride-hailing companies such as Uber and Lyft so far has not been hindered by limits from government regulators and campaigns by taxi cab competitors. A bigger threat to the new industry's impressive start could come from customers — if enough people stop using the services over fears that drivers aren't safe.

headline.main: Is Rider Safety the Real Achilles Heel for Uber and Lyft?
headline.print_headline: Is Rider Safety the Real Achilles Heel for Uber and Lyft?
